contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 11, 1930 D Scottish Championship (Championship Section)
Scottish Championship (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Scotland
Championship
Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Rimmer]
Waverley Market, Edinburgh 16 bands played.
1st prize £20 and Challenge Cup. 2nd prize £16 and Daily Record Cup. 3rd prize £12. 4th prize £6. 5th prize £4. 6th prize £3.
Soloist prizes Cornet and Trombone to City of Edinburgh, Euphonium to Clydebank Burgh
Oct. 3, 2011, 1:28 p.m. June 11, 2013, 3 p.m.
1 City of Edinburgh Band F. Dimmock
2 Clydebank Burgh Band William Halliwell
3 Newmains John Faulds
4 Darvel Burgh Fred Rogan
5 Bonnybridge & District George J. Grant
6 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd Robert Rimmer
